mapper.sql: ID, MERCHANT_CODE, USER_ID, TRAN_AMT, BUSINESS_TYPE, ORDER_AMT, POUNDAGE, BUSINESS_SOURCE, SERIAL, BUSINESS_RESULT, POS_SN, INTEGRAL, SOURCE_SERIAL, STATUS, CARD_NUMBER, BANK_NAME, MERCHANT_NAME, SERVICE_SCORE, ENVIRONMENT_SCORE, PRICE_SCORE, to_char(BUSINESS_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') BUSINESS_TIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from WX_USERS_BUSSINESS where business_source='00' and business_result='01' and to_char(BUSINESS_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{businessTime} and business_type='00' and status ='00'
order by ${orderByClause}

select MERCHANT_CODE,MERCHANT_NAME,sum(tran_amt) sumTranAmt,sum(order_amt) sumOrderAmt,sum(poundage) sumPoundage from WX_USERS_BUSSINESS where business_source='00' and business_result='01' and to_char(BUSINESS_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{businessTime} and status='00' and business_type !='03' group by MERCHANT_CODE ,MERCHANT_NAME
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into WX_USERS_BUSSINESS (ID, MERCHANT_CODE, USER_ID, TRAN_AMT, BUSINESS_TYPE, ORDER_AMT, POUNDAGE, BUSINESS_SOURCE, SERIAL, BUSINESS_RESULT, POS_SN, INTEGRAL, SOURCE_SERIAL, STATUS, CARD_NUMBER, BANK_NAME, SERVICE_SCORE, ENVIRONMENT_SCORE, PRICE_SCORE, BUSINESS_TIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MERCHANT_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{USER_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TRAN_AMT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{BUSINESS_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ORDER_AMT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{POUNDAGE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{BUSINESS_SOURCE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SERIAL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BUSINESS_RESULT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{POS_SN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{INTEGRAL,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{SOURCE_SERIAL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{STATUS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CARD_NUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BANK_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SERVICE_SCORE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ENVIRONMENT_SCORE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{PRICE_SCORE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{BUSINESS_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{CREATE_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{UPDATE_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
